content.p: Disclosure We strongly advice student to disclose their disability before they submit their application form so that we can advice the student accordingly. The Disability Advisory services will contact the student to discuss about the reasonable adjustments based on the recommendation from their medical specialist. Student are responsible to ensure that the University is aware of your disability by alerting the University through: Back to main telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
